section3.title: III. General Information on Data Processing

subsection1.title: 1. Scope of Processing Personal Data
subsection1.content: We collect and use personal data of our users only to the extent necessary to provide a functional website and our content and services.

subsection2.title: 2. Legal Basis for Processing Personal Data
subsection2.content: Insofar as we obtain consent from the data subject for processing personal data, Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) serves as the legal basis.

subsection3.title: 3. Data Deletion and Storage Duration
subsection3.content: The personal data of the data subject will be deleted or blocked as soon as the purpose of storage ceases to apply.

section4.title: IV. Provision of the Website and Creation of Log Files

subsection1.title: 1. Description and Scope of Data Processing
subsection1.content: Each time our website is accessed, our system automatically collects data and information from the computer system of the calling computer.

subsection2.title: 2. Legal Basis for Data Processing
subsection2.content: The legal basis for the temporary storage of data and log files is Art. 6 para. 1 lit. f GDPR.

subsection3.title: 3. Purpose of Data Processing
subsection3.content: The temporary storage of the IP address by the system is necessary to deliver the website to the user's computer.

subsection4.title: 4. Storage Duration
subsection4.content: The data will be deleted as soon as it is no longer necessary for the purpose of its collection.

subsection5.title: 5. Possibility of Objection and Removal
subsection5.content: The collection of data for the provision of the website and the storage of data in log files is mandatory for the operation of the website.

subsection1.title: 1. Description and Scope of Data Processing
subsection1.content: Our website uses cookies. Cookies are text files that are stored in the internet browser or by the internet browser on the user's computer system.

subsection2.title: 2. Legal Basis for Data Processing
subsection2.content: The legal basis for processing personal data using cookies is Art. 6 para. 1 lit. f GDPR.

subsection3.title: 3. Purpose of Data Processing
subsection3.content: The purpose of using technically necessary cookies is to simplify the use of websites for users.

subsection4.title: 4. Storage Duration, Objection and Removal Options
subsection4.content: Cookies are stored on the user's computer. Therefore, as a user, you have full control over the use of cookies.

section6.title: VI. Contact Form and Email Contact

subsection1.title: 1. Description and Scope of Data Processing
subsection1.content: A contact form is available on our website which can be used for electronic contact.

subsection2.title: 2. Legal Basis for Data Processing
subsection2.content: The legal basis for processing data with the user's consent is Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a GDPR.

subsection3.title: 3. Purpose of Data Processing
subsection3.content: The processing of personal data from the input form serves us solely to process the contact.

subsection4.title: 4. Storage Duration
subsection4.content: The data will be deleted as soon as it is no longer necessary for the purpose of its collection.

subsection5.title: 5. Possibility of Objection and Removal
subsection5.content: The user has the option to revoke consent to the processing of personal data at any time.

section7.title: VII. Integration of Third-Party Services and Content
section7.content: We integrate content or service offers from third-party providers within our online offering based on our legitimate interests. This particularly applies to Google Maps and Google Fonts.

section8.title: VIII. Rights of the Data Subject

subsection1.title: 1. Right to Information
subsection1.content: You can request confirmation from the controller as to whether personal data concerning you is being processed by us.

subsection2.title: 2. Right to Rectification
subsection2.content: You have the right to rectification and/or completion with respect to the controller.

subsection3.title: 3. Right to Restriction of Processing
subsection3.content: Under certain conditions, you may request the restriction of processing.

subsection4.title: 4. Right to Erasure
subsection4.content: You can request that the controller immediately delete the personal data concerning you.

subsection5.title: 5. Right to Notification
subsection5.content: You have the right to be notified about recipients of your data.

subsection6.title: 6. Right to Data Portability
subsection6.content: You have the right to receive the personal data concerning you in a structured format.

subsection7.title: 7. Right to Object
subsection7.content: You have the right to object to processing for reasons arising from your particular situation.

subsection8.title: 8. Right to Revoke
subsection8.content: You have the right to revoke your data protection consent declaration at any time.

subsection9.title: 9. Automated Decision Making
subsection9.content: You have the right not to be subject to a decision based solely on automated processing.

subsection10.title: 10. Right to Lodge a Complaint
subsection10.content: You have the right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority.
